v2.1.10-03

 v2.1.10-02
 Disabled new MMS dispatch alert logic which turns out to not work.
 
 v2.1.10-01
 Processing of MMS dispatch alerts under Android 5 and up no longer requires the assistance of a compatible message app.
 
 Screen control options that serve no purpose under Android 10 have been removed.

 Warren County, VA
